actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to require that the area wage adjustment under the prospective payment system for skilled nursing facility services be based on the wages of individuals employed at skilled nursing facilities.
short_title: Skilled Nursing Facility Wage Information Improvement Act of 2001

summary.text: Skilled Nursing Facility Wage Information Improvement Act of 2001 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act (SSA) to require that the area wage adjustment under the prospective payment system for skilled nursing facility services be based on the wages of individuals employed at skilled nursing facilities.

titles.title: Skilled Nursing Facility Wage Information Improvement Act of 2001

A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to require that the area wage adjustment under the prospective payment system for skilled nursing facility services be based on the wages of individuals employed at skilled nursing facilities.
